cause.description:
If more people could fix their pets there would be less accidental pregnancies in animals. Which lead to lots of strays, because homes can't be found for the extra animals!
http://www.hsus.org/pets/issues_affecting_our_pets/pet_overpopulation_and_ownership_statistics/spay_day_usa/
1. That more animals should be fixed.
cause.mission: Minimize the excess of stray animals.
cause.name: Spay and Neuter Your animals!
